title: The future of materials - Deloitte
summary: Eastman is focusing on chemical recycling projects to reduce waste and emissions, collaborating with partners and utilizing technologies to recycle complex waste plastics and polyester waste, aiming to achieve sustainability goals and reduce greenhouse gas emissions.
green_innovation: TRUE. Eastman's initiatives in chemical recycling projects demonstrate green innovation by addressing environmental sustainability goals, reducing waste and emissions, and promoting circularity globally.

green_product: TRUE. Eastman's focus on chemical recycling projects and the development of sustainable products made from recycled plastics qualify as green products due to their reduced environmental impact throughout the products' life cycles.
green_process: TRUE. Eastman's adoption of chemical-recycling processes, such as Carbon Renewal Technology and Polyester Renewal Technology, exemplifies green processes by aiming to minimize environmental impacts, reduce waste, and lower greenhouse gas emissions.
